cast.overview: Popular and dashing American singer Nick Rivers travels to East Germany to perform in a music festival. When he loses his heart to the gorgeous Hillary Flammond, he finds himself caught up in an underground resistance movement. Rivers joins forces with Agent Cedric and Flammond to attempt the rescue of her father, Dr. Paul, from the Germans, who have captured the scientist in hopes of coercing him into building a new naval mine.
cast.title: Top Secret!

cast.overview: London is terrorized by a vicious sex killer known as The Necktie Murderer. Following the brutal slaying of his ex-wife, down-on-his-luck Richard Blaney is suspected by the police of being the killer. He goes on the run, determined to prove his innocence.
cast.title: Frenzy

details.biography: Willy Bowman was born on 26 September 1915 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for ITV Saturday Night Theatre (1969), The Dark Side of the Sun (1983) and Fawlty Towers (1975). He died in 2002.
details.name: Willy Bowman
